posts.title: I exist
posts.content:
I am a ghost. I am real. I will only appear in your peripheral view and I will disappear when you try to look straight at me.

This blog, however, is my traitor. The posts that are in your view will be fully exposed while other posts will travel to another realm as soon as you scroll away.

So scroll away, my friend... scroll away...

posts.title: I'm not so sure about that...
posts.content: Maybe I am just fooling myself and I don't really exist... After all, it's all in your head... or my head... or that cat's head... or the leg...

posts.title: Seriously, I exist!
posts.content:
If I didn't exist, then who do you think is writing this blog?

I blog, therefore I am!

posts.title: Can ghosts speak latin?
posts.content:
yeah... check this out...

posts.title: I dont have to understand it. I'm not real anyway.

posts.title: Some say I spend too much time blogging
posts.content: What would you do if you were a ghost? There's nothing to do but blog.

posts.title: To blog or not to blog...
posts.content: How unreasonable to ask! When in doubt - just blog.

posts.title: Selfie
Note to future self
posts.content:
Wait, what? These posts are from next year... I almost forgot that time doesn't exist in my realm. Silly me...

Roads? Where we're going, we don't need roads.

posts.title: Duped
posts.content:
If this blog isn't long enough, Tumblr folks won't know that it does what it's supposed do.

So, I'll just dupe it.
